DataElement.preferredDefinition: A response as to whether the patient is unable to provide informed consent.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Consent by a patient to a surgical or medical procedure or participation in a clinical study after achieving an understanding of the relevant medical facts and the risks involved._An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction._The quality of being able to perform; a quality that permits or facilitates achievement or accomplishment .

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Consent by a patient to a surgical or medical procedure or participation in a clinical study after achieving an understanding of the relevant medical facts and the risks involved.

Concepts.definition: Consent by a patient to a surgical or medical procedure or participation in a clinical study after achieving an understanding of the relevant medical facts and the risks involved.

Property.preferredDefinition: An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction.:The quality of being able to perform; a quality that permits or facilitates achievement or accomplishment .

Concepts.definition: An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction.
The quality of being able to perform; a quality that permits or facilitates achievement or accomplishment.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.
